title: [Decimation | Wiki] 1.7.10行尸模组的官方Wiki翻译:指令和权限节点
author: MC小菜鸡
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MC小菜鸡 于 2019-9-2 22:15 编辑 

There are many different permission nodes that you can use if you're running on a Thermos-like environment (Forge and Bukkit). If you're using a group/permissions plugin, such as GroupManager for example, these permission nodes will come in handy for preventing players from using specific commands. These permission nodes can be used in the same way you would use a plugin permission node, eg "essentials.spawn".
如果你是类似Thermos核心的服务器(有Forge 和 Bukkit运行环境)你可以使用本模组的一些指令及其权限节点。如果你使用了类似GroupManager的权限组插件，这将在允许或禁止玩家使用某些模组指令的方面起作用。这些权限节点的使用方式与使用插件权限节点的方式相同，例如“essentials.spawn”。

Please keep in mind that some permission nodes on this list may change from time to time. If you happen to have any issues with any of these provided permission nodes, please open a new thread about the situation on our Decimation Bugs & Glitches forums section.
这些权限节点可能随着版本更新改动。如果你发现这些权限节点出现问题(例如失效)请在Decimation Bugs & Glitches反馈


Common Commands (/deci help)
net.decimation.mod.common.handlers.Handler_Commands

基础指令(/deci help)
net.decimation.mod.common.handlers.Handler_Commands



Server Commands (/deciserver help)
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_Server

服务器指令 (/deciserver help)
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_Server


Screenshot Command (/screenshot <playerName>
net.decimation.mod.server.screenshot.ScreenshotCommand

截屏指令 (/screenshot <玩家名字>
net.decimation.mod.server.screenshot.ScreenshotCommand


Update Command (/update)
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_Update

更新指令 (/update)
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_Update


Trader Commands (/trader help)
net.decimation.mod.server.traders.TraderCommands
商人指令 (/trader help)
net.decimation.mod.server.traders.TraderCommands


Zone Commands (/zone help)
net.decimation.mod.server.zones.ZoneCommands

区域指令 (/zone help)
net.decimation.mod.server.zones.ZoneCommands


Turf Commands (/turf help)
net.decimation.mod.server.turf.TurfCommands

 可占领区域指令(/turf help)
net.decimation.mod.server.turf.TurfCommands


Respawn Command (/rspawn)
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_RSpawn

随机传送指令 (/rspawn)
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_RSpawn


Bottlecap Commands (/caps)
net.decimation.mod.common.common_commands.Command_BottleCaps

瓶盖指令 (/caps)
net.decimation.mod.common.common_commands.Command_BottleCaps


Clan Commands (/clan help)
net.decimation.mod.server.clans.ClanCommands

队伍指令 (/clan help)
net.decimation.mod.server.clans.ClanCommands


Supporter Commands (/supporter) Deprecated
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_Supporter

支持者指令 (/supporter) 已弃用
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_Supporter


Discord Auth Code Command (/getAuth) Deprecated
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_DiscordAuthCode

获取Discord Auth编号指令(/getAuth) 已弃用
net.decimation.mod.server.commands.Command_DiscordAuthCode


Voice Chat Addon Commands
net.gliby.voicechat.common.commands.CommandVoiceMute
net.gliby.voicechat.common.commands.CommandChatMode

语音聊天插件指令
net.gliby.voicechat.common.commands.CommandVoiceMute
net.gliby.voicechat.common.commands.CommandChatMode


原帖地址:https://www.boehmod.com/forum/ewr-carta/deci_permission_nodes/
